tool_description: Uploads and manages supporting documents for provenance records including receipts, certificates, correspondence, and other evidence.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection item

document_type.description: Type of document (receipt, certificate, letter, contract, appraisal, photograph, other)

document_date.description: Date of the document in ISO 8601 format

source_person.description: Person or organization who provided the document

authenticity_verified.description: Whether document authenticity has been verified

file_format.description: File format of the document (pdf, jpg, png, tiff, doc, txt)

related_owners.description: Names of owners mentioned in the document

error_messages: Item not found: The specified item_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid document_type: Must be one of [receipt, certificate, letter, contract, appraisal, photograph, other].
File too large: File size must not exceed 50MB.
Invalid file_format: Must be one of [pdf, jpg, png, tiff, doc, txt].
Invalid document_date: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Too many keywords: Maximum 20 keywords allowed.
Too many related_owners: Maximum 10 related owners allowed.
usage: Provide item_id, document_type, document_title, file_format, and file_size_mb. Add optional metadata like date, source, keywords, and related owners for better organization.

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the uploaded document

storage_path.description: Internal storage path for the document
